description:
Worn and basic, this iron blade is a common choice 
for novice adventurers.
name: Rusty Iron Blade
note: First Weapon of Crolos and Sir Eldrick

description:
A well-crafted steel sword suitable for those gaining 
experience, providing a reliable weapon.
name: Steel Apprentice Saber

description:
This longsword enhances cutting power and is favored by
aspiring knights.
name: Enchanted Knight's Longsword

description:
This ominous blade is a weapon of considerable power 
sought after by seasoned warriors.
name: Dreadforged Blade of the Abyss

description:
A legendary sword forged by celestial beings, 
possessing extraordinary sharpness.
name: Ethereal Seraphim Blade

description: An exquisite sword resonating with otherworldly power.
name: Celestial Emberblade

description:
A formidable claymore with an aura of darkness, known 
for its ability to harvest the essence of fallen foes.
name: Soulreaper Claymore

description: A sleek rapier designed for precision strikes.
name: Wraithbane Rapier

description:
A massive greatsword that harnesses 
the power of solar energy
name: Solarflare Greatsword

description:
Forged from abyssal materials, this dark blade radiates
an aura of malevolence, delivering devastating blows.
name: Abyssal Doomblade

description:
A small and basic steel dagger, suitable for stealthy 
maneuvers and basic combat.
name: Steel Knifepoint

description:
This dagger adds a lethal edge to its attacks and is 
favored by rogues and assassins.
name: Venomous Fangblade

description:
A sleek dagger with a darkened blade, crafted for 
precision and silent takedowns.
name: Shadowstrike Dirk

description:
This legendary dagger allows wielders to move unseen 
and deliver supernatural, lethal strikes.
name: Ethereal Nightstalker Dagger

description:
It embodies celestial forces and enhances the agility 
of its wielder.
name: Astral Serpent Dagger

description:
A basic and worn axe showing signs of age and use, 
commonly chosen by novice adventurers.
name: Rustaxe

description:
A standard iron axe, reliable for combat, suitable for 
those seeking a straightforward and sturdy weapon.
name: Ironcleave

description:
A darkened axe crafted for both power and speed, ideal 
for seasoned warriors who favor formidable strikes.
name: Shadowcleaver

description:
This battleaxe delivers chilling blows and is a 
formidable choice for warriors in wintry environments.
name: Frostbite Battleaxe

description: A mythical axe forged with celestial grace.
name: Celestial Eclipse Splitter

description:
This staff is a beginner's choice for those learning 
the art of healing.
name: Herbalist's Bloomwood Staff

description:
Infused with calming energies, this wand enhances basic
healing spells and is favored by acolytes in training.
name: Acolyte's Serenity Wand

description:
This staff allows for more complex magical 
manipulations and is favored by experienced healers.
name: Mystic Crystal Infuser

description:
It radiates a warm, healing glow, providing substantial
restoration and protective blessings.
name: Cleric's Radiant Scepter

description:
This legendary staff can resurrect fallen allies, 
cleanse ailments, and create powerful protective wards.
name: Divine Healer's Ethereal Staff

description:
A celestial staff with potent healing abilities
symbolizing both grace and potent mending power.
name: Celestial Mendstaff

description:
A basic staff for novice spellcasters, often used for 
learning the basics of magic.
name: Novawand

description:
This staff enhances the wielder's ability to channel 
and control arcane energies.
name: Aetherstaff

description:
This staff is favored by more experienced mages, 
allowing for more complex magical manipulations.
name: Mystistaff

description:
This staff provides a significant boost to magical 
prowess and is sought after by advanced spellcasters.
name: Eldritch Rod

description:
A legendary staff said to channel the energy of the 
stars themselves.
name: Celestistave

description:
A celestial conduit empowering its wielder with mastery
over cosmic energies.
name: Stellar Arcanum Scepter
